price: Shin, (kunã so) in gaya* muku a kan wanda Shaiɗãnnu kan sauka?
arabic: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ
footnotes: * Wannan dõmin raddi ne gamãsu cewa aljannu ke gayawa Muhammadu, tsira da amincin Allah su tabbata a gareshi, Alƙur'ãni. Aljannu bã su saukã sai ga maƙaryaci, mai zunubi' Muhammadu kuwa bã haka yake ba. Sabõda haka shi bã mahaukaci ba, kuma ba wanda aljannu suke gaya wa ba. Dukan abin da ya faɗa, to, wahayi ne daga Allah.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: hal unabbi-ukum ʿalā man tanazzalu al-shayāṭīnu
